DOC.brief_summary: The investigators performed a 12-week, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled human trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Cauliflower Mushroom extract on promotion of immunity. The investigators measured promotion of immunity parameters , including Cytotoxicity, Cytokine (IL-4, IL-10, IFN- γ, TNF-α), and CBC (WBC, RBC, Hb, Hct, MCV, MCH, MCHC, PLT), and monitored their blood pressure.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Cauliflower Mushroom Extract on Promotion of Immunity
DOC.criteria: Males and females 3065 years old Weight within ±30% of ideal body weight Able to give informed consent WBC concentration below 3000 ㎕ Allergic or hypersensitive to any of the ingredients in the test products Diagnosed of gastrointestinal disease such as Immunerelated diseases, severe hepatic, renal failure, and diabetes History of reaction to any of the test products or of gastrointestinal diseases such as Crohn's disease or gastrointestinal surgery History of alcohol or substance abuse Participation in any other clinical trials within past 2 months Laboratory test, medical or psychological conditions deemed by the investigators to interfere with successful participation in the study Pregnant or lactating women etc.
